backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing authorization plus CRUD operations for products, customers, bills, expenses, and user profiles using Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two frontend features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across app, hooks, components, screens, offline modules, and styles.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android project build artifacts, logs, IDE files, and temporary directories.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android build configuration enabling PWA URL validation, custom APK naming, ProGuard, and modern SDK settings.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules preserving WebView, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper app classes.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android app manifest defining permissions, main activity, deep linking, and app metadata.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Main Android activity loading the PWA in a fullscreen WebView with navigation handling, dark mode, and media/geolocation support.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon resource using the same background and foreground setup.
Adaptive launcher icon resource referencing background and foreground assets.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines launcher icon background color used by adaptive icons.
Defines app name, PWA URL, and basic error/loading strings for the Android wrapper.
Defines the Android app theme, fullscreen variant, and background color.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting Kotlin and Android Gradle plugin versions and repositories.
frontend/android/dist/.gitkeep: Placeholder to keep the dist directory in version control.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, Jetifier, R8, Kotlin style, and JVM config.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies the Gradle wrapper distribution URL and related paths.
frontend/android/README.md: Documentation for the Android wrapper app explaining configuration, PWA URL requirements, and build instructions.
frontend/android/scripts/build-release-a: Builds a versioned release APK, validates PWA URL, stages output, and writes build metadata.
frontend/android/scripts/publish-release: Publishes the built APK by generating publish metadata and preparing a unique download ID.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures repositories, project name, and includes the app module.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading the PWA, icons, manifest, and service worker with build‑ID cache busting.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA metadata including name, colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, app‑shell caching, and network/cache strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile loading, screen navigation, and build‑ID cache resets.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with side navigation, mobile drawer, top bar, content area, and footer while managing mobile nav state.
Displays a detailed startup error screen with diagnostics, retry, and cache reset options, including special handling for watchdog timeouts.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Dialog for creating or editing customers with form fields, offline queue support, and automatic ID handling.
Mobile navigation drawer listing app screens with icons and triggers navigation when items are selected.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Dialog for creating or editing products with validation, stock unit conversion, offline queue support, and auto‑incremented IDs.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableC: Renders data as a list of card-like rows or shows an empty state; includes a CardRow helper component.
frontend/src/components/RootErrorBoundar: Global error boundary that shows an error screen with reload and reset options when unexpected runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Sidebar navigation that persists and restores the last selected screen using localStorage and triggers navigation on selection.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: Displays online status, pending sync changes, and errors with retry using useSyncStatus.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Renders the app header with menu, sync indicator, PWA install button, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context and authentication management using Internet Identity and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts and installability state via beforeinstallprompt events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, customers, and other backend entities using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupWatchdog.ts: Provides a watchdog timer to detect stalled startup phases and capture diagnostic info.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme color variables, and forces fully opaque Radix UI overlays and sheet components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Provides localStorage-based caching and an offline action queue with helpers to add, remove, and manage queued actions.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: React hook that executes actions immediately when online or queues them offline with simple status tracking.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: React hook that monitors online status and processes queued offline actions via the backend actor, updating sync and error states.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: Billing UI that builds bills with products, calculates totals, and submits or queues bill creation when offline.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays customer credit summaries by aggregating bills and showing pending balances with responsive layouts.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Displays and manages customers with add, edit, and delete actions, supporting offline queueing and responsive layouts.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows product, customer, bill, and credit stats plus sync status and recent activity summaries.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and optional profile setup with name and role selection.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Lists products with add, edit, and delete actions, including stock indicators and offline queue support.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Generates sales, expense, and profit reports with date filtering and supports creating and deleting expenses offline.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Provides functions to compute billing totals and GST amounts, including legacy bill handling.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Exports a build ID used to detect new deployments and refresh caches.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Generates formatted invoice HTML from bill and customer data and opens a print window; includes logic to consolidate product line items.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Provides functions to compute daily sales, date‑range summaries, and profit calculations using bills, products, customers, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/resetCachedApp.ts: Clears local/session storage, caches, and service workers, then reloads the page to reset the app state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing priorities, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature implementations.
